favourite.article: Faith is being infused into us day by day as we read His Word, and as we spend time lingering in His presence. What a precious economy has been revealed to us dear saints.
Through eating, drinking, and breathing Him as His word spontaneously brings forth faith in our living. Hallelujah!

The faith is economy of God is a wonderful song for me because I will appreciate this song with my family, best friend, daughter, sister, brother, pastor, pastoral. This song should be a song of the economy of faith and forever to God I will raise up my praises to You my God.
This song is put together from 1 Tim 1:1 footnote 1, from the 2nd paragraph onward, for anyone who's wondering.

Lord Jesus we love You. I praise You for this faith infused into my being. This faith caused me to appreciate your preciousness. Lord You are the Author of this faith. Perfect me with Your divine life so soon. Amen.
